issue.title: What is the structure of the final?

content.raw:
I agree with the concept of running ROS on both the local and remote computer. One illustrative concept is to run RVIZ locally connecting to the master node on the remote computer.

The question I have is can you run a ROS connection over the Internet? In particular what would be in the ROS network configuration setup? How do you get the IP address? I know in general how to do this but is it reliable connecting to a cloud system?
content.html:
I agree with the concept of running ROS on both the local and remote computer. One illustrative concept is to run RVIZ locally connecting to the master node on the remote computer.

The question I have is can you run a ROS connection over the Internet? In particular what would be in the ROS network configuration setup? How do you get the IP address? I know in general how to do this but is it reliable connecting to a cloud system?
